answers.answer: The algorithm we use to train our Q-function

answers.feedback: Incorrect. It's an action-value function since it determines the value of being at a particular state and taking a specific action at that state

answers.answer: An algorithm that determines the value of being at a particular state and taking a specific action at that state

answers.feedback: Incorrect. Q-function is not a Q-table. The Q-function is the algorithm that will feed the Q-table.
